resources.string: Are you sure you want to Delete?
There are more players than challenges!
Killer\'s game has just started. Here is the information that concerns you:\Your target: %1$s\nnChallenge that you must make him achieve: %2$s
Well done, you have killed %1$s!\nHere is your new target: %2$s\nNew challenge : %3$s
Congratulation %1$s! You\'re the winner! 50 points to Gryffindor!
Are you sure to start the game? This will cause %1$s text messages to be sent to different players.
There are no players in the game yet. Please create one by clicking on the button at the bottom right.
There are no challenges yet. Please create one by clicking on the button at the bottom right.
There is no historical party yet. You can create a game by clicking here.
Make him say a compliment about you
Talk about philosophy for at least 5 min
Show a photo of him/her when he/she was younger
Give you a kiss on the cheek
Play metal music loudly for everyone to hear
Make a prank call to a random number
Dance the carioca (or at least try, it\'s the intention that counts!)
Make him imitate one of the guests of the party
Make him reveal an embarrassing/funny anecdote in his life
Play a game of "I've got you, you've got me by the goatee" with you
Succeed in making him say “pryapism” 3 times during the game
Have a grimace contest with you
